summary.placeholder_text_not_analyzed: Run Game Analysis to view Game Summary

player_stats.placeholder_text_no_player: Select a player to view statistics
player_stats.placeholder_text_no_analyzed: No analyzed games found for this player

no_engines.title: No Engine Configured
no_engines.message_template:
Please add at least one UCI chess engine before {action}.

Go to Engines  Add Engine... to configure an engine.

no_assignment.title: No Engine Assigned
no_assignment.message_template:
Please assign an engine to the {task} task before {action}.

Go to Engines  [Engine Name]  Assign to {task}.

descriptions.exact_pgn: Match games with identical PGN strings (headers + moves). This is the most strict matching mode.
descriptions.moves_only: Match games with identical moves, ignoring header information. Useful when the same game appears with different metadata.
descriptions.normalized_pgn: Match games after removing comments, variations, annotations, and extra whitespace. Useful when PGN formatting differs.
descriptions.header_based: Match games based on selected header fields. Useful when you want to identify games by specific metadata rather than moves.

description.text: A comprehensive chess analysis and review application for studying games and improving your play.

license.text:

passed_pawn.name: Passed Pawn
passed_pawn.description: Evaluates passed pawns (pawns with no enemy pawns in front)

backward_pawn.name: Backward Pawn
backward_pawn.description: Evaluates backward pawns (pawns behind friendly pawns that cannot advance safely)

isolated_pawn.name: Isolated Pawn
isolated_pawn.description: Evaluates isolated pawns (pawns with no friendly pawns on adjacent files)

doubled_pawn.name: Doubled Pawn
doubled_pawn.description: Evaluates doubled pawns (multiple pawns on the same file)

king_safety.name: King Safety
king_safety.description: Evaluates king safety (open files, pawn shield, exposed king)

weak_square.name: Weak Square
weak_square.description: Evaluates weak squares (squares that cannot be defended by pawns)

piece_activity.name: Piece Activity
piece_activity.description: Evaluates piece activity (mobility and central control)

undeveloped_piece.name: Undeveloped Piece
undeveloped_piece.description: Evaluates undeveloped pieces (pieces still on starting squares and blocked)

outpost_square.name: Outpost Square
outpost_square.description: Evaluates outpost squares (squares that must be protected by friendly pawns and cannot be attacked by enemy pawns)
